betterquesting:10.desc:8:
As powerful as enchants are there are limits to their potential, such as Sharpness being limited to five levels. But these limits can be broken.

The Overchanter will push an item's enchants up by one level, going from top to bottom. Each upgrade requires 32 Praecantatio Essentia and 30 levels from a nearby player. To start the process place an enchanted item in the Overchanter and double right-click it with a wand.

One limitation: Each individual item can only have a given enchant upgraded once. If a sword's Smite enchant is upgraded that sword can never have Smite upgraded again, even if it were stripped off and replaced with a weaker enchant.

The Overchanter also will not skip enchants that don't benefit from being upgraded, I.E. Silk Touch II, but that is a minor issue given the upgraded enchants should still work normally.

§3There's a minor graphical bug where §oevery§r§3 enchant seemingly gets +1 if you have the Overchanter's UI open when the process finishes, but simply closing and re-opening it fixes that.
